programme.title: Vera Dreams of the Sea

programme.title: A Childhood

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Seeds Of Violence
programme.desc: At the Hamburg DOM festival, Helen Dorn and forensic scientist Weyer witness a paramedic's brutal assault. When a high-society boy is later found dead, unravelling a dark secret linking the two cases.

programme.title: A Childhood
programme.desc: As summer drags by, 13-year-old Jimmy, forced by circumstance to become an adult too soon, runs up against the limits of his small hometown and his turbulent life, caught between a mother on the slide and a stepfather who keeps her down.

programme.title: The Peace And Love Process
programme.desc: Marie and Simon, a couple with two children, are deeply in love despite constant fights in their paired life. To save their marriage, they come up with a chart of Ten Rules to seek love and peace.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Last Resort
programme.desc: Haunted by a colleague's suicide and grappling with guilt, Helen Dorn confronts the unspoken accusations of her fellow officers. At the same time, she is assigned to solve a medical student's murder, where she soon uncovers their double life.

programme.title: The Reports on Sarah and Saleem
programme.desc: The illicit affair of a married Palestinian man and a married Israeli woman in Jerusalem takes a dangerous political dimension when they are spotted in the wrong place at the wrong time leaving them to deal with more than their broken marriages.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Golden Fish
programme.desc: A popular Physics teacher is found dead following an experiment gone wrong. Could his death merely be an accident or could it have been a result of foul play? Things become more complicated when a rumour of a teacher-student affair surfaces.

programme.title: Free Money
programme.desc: Based on true stories of the crypto and investment craze of the early 2020-ies. Crypto's allure, wealth's pursuit, and the lessons of a changing financial world collide in an intense journey of three interconnected lives - an unwitting Bitcoin holder, a crypto entrepreneur and a conservative banker.

programme.title: Thank You For Coming
programme.desc: After coming to the realization that time is not on his side, a small-time actor who currently works as a restaurant waiter, must try anything and everything to fulfil his dream of starring in a feature film.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: To My Beloved (OTO)
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.
